ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Programs"), ISPICKVAL( animalos__Stage__c , "Completed") , OR( ISPICKVAL( animalos__Result__c ,""), ISBLANK( aos_Financial_Agreement_Details__c), ISBLANK( aos_Financial_Agreement_Date__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot set the Referral to Completed, unless a selection is made at Result and the Financial Agreement fields are completed at the bottom of the form.
